panels.description: Uptime of the Mesos master process.
panels.title: Master uptime

panels.description: Amount of memory available in the cluster.
panels.title: Memory available

panels.description: Total number of GPUs available in the cluster.
panels.title: GPUs available

panels.description: Current amount of bytes inside the cluster.
panels.title: Disk available

panels.description: The percentage of allocated memory in use by the cluster.
panels.title: Memory utilization

panels.description: The percentage of allocated disk storage in use by the cluster.
panels.title: Disk utilization

panels.description: The number of events in the event queue.
panels.title: Events in queue

panels.description: The rate of messages being processed.
panels.title: Messages

panels.description: Duration of fetching and storing the Mesos agent registrar state.
panels.title: Registrar state

panels.description: Whether or not the registrar log was properly recovered.
panels.title: Registrar log recovered

panels.description: The rate of how often the allocator is performing allocations.
panels.title: Allocation runs

panels.description: Time spent in the allocation algorithm in ms.
panels.title: Allocation duration

panels.description: The number of dispatch events in the allocator mesos event queue.
panels.title: Event queue dispatches

panels.description: The percentage of allocated memory in use by the agent.

targets.expr: max by(mesos_cluster) (100 * mesos_slave_mem_used_bytes{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", mesos_cluster=~"$mesos_cluster"} / clamp_min(mesos_slave_mem_bytes{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", mesos_cluster=~"$mesos_cluster"},1))

panels.title: Agent memory utilization

panels.description: The percentage of allocated disk storage in use by the agent.

targets.expr: max by(mesos_cluster) (100 * mesos_slave_disk_used_bytes{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", mesos_cluster=~"$mesos_cluster"} / clamp_min(mesos_slave_disk_bytes{job=~"$job", instance=~"$instance", mesos_cluster=~"$mesos_cluster"},1))

panels.title: Agent disk utilization

panels.description: The application logs for the Mesos master node.
panels.title: Master logs

panels.description: The application logs for the Mesos agent node.
panels.title: Agent logs
